original_title: Monster Madness: Mutants, Space Invaders, and Drive-Ins
overview: From THINGS to BODY SNATCHERS to CREATURES FROM THE BLACK LAGOON, sci-fi monsters dominated 1950s horror. Take a ride to an era of drive-ins, Red Scares, low budgets and big bugs with SPACE INVADERS AND DRIVE INS.
title: Monster Madness: Mutants, Space Invaders, and Drive-Ins
